title: Amazing Phone!
comment: Absolutely love this phone. The camera is incredible and it's super fast. Delivery was also quicker than expected. Highly recommend this seller.

title: Beautiful dress, slightly big
comment: The dress is gorgeous and the fabric is high quality. It was a little larger than the size chart indicated, but I was able to get it tailored. Overall, very happy with it.

title: Decent shoes, but took a while to arrive.
comment: The sneakers are okay, comfortable enough for daily wear. However, the shipping took over a week, which was longer than I expected.

title: Wrong color sent
comment: I ordered the black one but received the grey model. Had to go through the return process which was a bit of a hassle. The phone itself is fine but the mistake was annoying.
